alert.note: Alert for Appomattox; Charlotte (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:19PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Appomattox and Charlotte Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Madisonville, or near Red House, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keysville... Charlotte Court House... Phenix... Red House... Drakes Branch... Pamplin City... and Madisonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Seek shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
